trs: I won't go to the bush.
I will go to your farm.

imt: if  you\textsc{.irr}  beat  dog    s/he\textsc{.fut}  die
src: ən  ka    ɗuu  karáŋ    tʃí    məʃi.
trs: If you beat the dog, it will die.

src: Gǎrbà   kən  ndʒaŋ  sloː  wú  ɗe  kə   fǔː-m.
trs: If Garba slaughters a beast, tell me
He is going to him (i.e., his home).
You are already going to eat?
